ESG REPORT 2022Social—Diversity, Equity and Inclusion 28Diversity, Equity and Inclusion
SunPower recognizes the importance of a diverse and inclusive work environment, and we have taken purposeful steps to create an even stronger culture of diversity, 
equity and inclusion. We are also committed to the principles of the CEO Action Pledge , which reinforces the development of programs that prioritize diversity.
Our Differences  
Make Us Stronger
We celebrate our differences. The way we identify 
ourselves also extends beyond these foundations 
to diversity of thought and perspective, a range 
of approaches to problem-solving and different 
life experiences. The value we place on diversity is 
reflected in the way we treat each other and our 
communities.Together We  
Are Powerful
We expect that all our employees are respected 
and welcomed, and that they feel they are part of 
something bigger. A culture of inclusion leads to 
more innovation, healthier working relationships, 
better decision-making, more fulfilled employees, 
a better ability to serve our customers and, 
ultimately, a company that does well by doing good.1 2
We Lead  
with Intention
Our leaders are expected to lead by example. 
This starts with building awareness on the part of 
every SunPower employee and holding ourselves 
accountable. We are committed to listening, 
learning and improving.3
